author: Louise Boyle, Louise Boyle
title: Coronavirus: Reusable shopping bags banned in New Hampshire to fight outbreak
description: An emergency order was issued to temporarily revert to single-use plastic or paper bags
content:
New Hampshire has banned the use of reusable shopping bags in a bid to stop the spread of the novel coronavirus.
Governor Chris Sununu issued the emergency order on Saturday to temporarily revert to single-use plastic or paper bags in grocery stores, superma… [+2137 chars]
